venue.name: Half Moon Coffee and Grille Cafe

item.description:
Benvenuti amici! We are BACK!

Please join us at one of our popular Meetup locations. Half Moon's atmosphere is condusive to lively conversation, good food if your hungry and what's great is that you can bring your own alcoholic beverage. Vino has flown freely at our Meetups in Wallingford.

Mark your calendars for a fun evening of Italian conversation and laughter.

Please Note: Starting with this meetup $1 will be collected at each Viva Italia Meetup from attending amici. Any money collected that is above and beyond the yearly subscription of $144 for this meetup group will be given back as part of one of our meetups.


Ci vediamo
Lorenzo
item.name: Serata di Caffe e Conversazione - Half Moon Coffee & Grille Cafe
